original_title: The Golden Age of Porn: Teri Weigel
overview: An AVN hall of famer, Teri Weigel was the first Playboy centerfold to appear in hardcore films. She was also the first Playboy Playmate to appear in Penthouse. She has since gone on to be a national dancer and appeared at the famous brothel, the Moonlight Bunny Ranch in Las Vegas.
title: The Golden Age of Porn: Teri Weigel
